post.author: Spyguy12
post.body: Is it possible to change the amount of health an enemy has? For example I have a zsec_pistol with a custom and I want to change the health to make it a boss character. Also is there a way to stop the body from disintegrating (say from a shotgun shot)?

post.author: TheMan176
post.body: You can use the health/# key/val pair to change the health of an enemy - just replace the hash with the desired health. I'm not sure how you can stop the body from disintegrating though, but I know it's possible.
